basics.name: Darshan Sudhakar
basics.label: Fidelity National Financials India
basics.summary:
Worked on various .NET applications starting from a single-person project to a team size of 100+ (divided by silos). Also, worked on several proof-of-concept projects needed for a company's sales pitch.

Having good functional knowledge in the field of Corporate and Investment Banking, Title Insurance, and other financial assets. Extensively worked on the trading application used in Forex, Fixed income, and their derivatives.
basics.headline: Ten years for professional experience in the field of .NET Application development and maintenance

projects.name: select-360-integration
projects.description:
SoftPro 360 is an integrated vendor portal included with SoftPro software. Using SoftPro 360, we can E-record documents, request a lien release, request tax certification, access property information, order checks, forms, and much more.

Team size: 6

My contribution
SafeEscrow
	Implemented the strategy pattern to handle multiple functionalities
	Printing of checks and records

Westcor
	Consumed Westcor's RESTful API service for issuing CPL and Jacket
	Co-ordinated with developers on the vendor side to understand their workflow. 

Notarize
	Co-ordinated with business to understand requirements
	Documented the RESTful calls using sequence diagram
	Document upload was cloud-based rather than sending a file over the wire. Implementation was the first of its kind and was done to handle large files.

Stewart
	Stewart had a sophisticated API. We had to make back and forth API calls to submit a Jacket request.
Generation of controls based on the response API using DataGridView and Table Layouts

Closing Lock
	Worked on requirement specification with the Product owner
	Documented the REST API calls using sequence diagrams
	Provided a high-level estimation of the product development
	Worked with my development team to build commonly used UI components giving rise to a new project called the re-usable components
	Delivered project in the stipulated time frame
	Implemented unit testing on the core logic

BC Law
	Worked on requirement specification and created a T-Shirt sizing template for estimation
	Worked on enhancing re-usable component

projects.name: select-hosted
projects.description:
Select Hosted is a SaaS offering of SoftPro Select application. Services of Select were broken into microservices and were hosted on a Cloud platform. 

Team size: 7

My contributions
Moved Rates services from stand-alone instance to a microservice container
Rates service was hosted on Azure Service Fabric
Implemented an interface for Select application to access Rates Services
Implementing a screen to fetch only selected rates from Rates services
projects.summary: A SaaS version of SoftPro Select

projects.name: select-csi
projects.description:
SoftPro Select manages the entire process from order entry through final title policy and takes advantage of the most robust library of closing, title, and escrow documents in the industry.

The CSI team, in particular, concentrated on production bug fixes and implementing mid-sized enhancements to existing customers.

Team size: 18

My contributions
L3 support
Performing a root cause analysis for a bug
Identifying functional drawbacks of a feature by speaking to product owners
Identifying technical debts and clarifying non-functional requirements
Estimating the time needed to fix technical debts by consulting an architect
Branch management using Git
projects.summary: A team that manages already released SoftPro Select versions in the market

projects.name: reports-dashboard
projects.description: The SoftPro Select Dashboard is a business intelligence tool to allow users to see production and management level analytics at a glance directly from the ProForm Start Page. With Dashboard, we get simple calendar views, opened/closed order views, and revenue details – all for any reporting periods. The dashboard can also be customized to meet customer's needs.
projects.summary: A dashboard website that shows analytics of Title and Escrow orders of a company

projects.name: gps-clientportal
projects.description:
GPS Client Portal is a website used by Fidelity National Financial and its subsidiaries to perform property and title searches.

Team size: 7

My contributions
Fixed 400+ bugs in 30 days
Implemented advance property search using Google Maps API and Bing Maps API
Implementing the parcel overlay feature
Consolidating the title search result with using FNF's title search API
projects.summary: A website that perform property and title searches for FNF and its subsidiaries

projects.name: order dashboard
projects.description: Select Report Installer is a packaging tool that is used to run SQL and SSRS scripts so that the reporting is ready to be used on the Select database. These reports were later accessed by customers using a web browser or the Select application.
projects.summary: Installer for running SSRS reporting scripts

projects.name: sigma
projects.description:
Sigma is a Winforms application used by the front office & back office department for booking the spot trade on the Forex market. Sigma maintains and monitors the overall Forex positions of the bank. The application captures all the forex spot trading bookings from upstream and downstream sources. The application generates reports for the back office to monitor Unusual activity and Market abuse behavior daily.

Team size : 4

My contribution
Worked as an individual contributor and performed requirement analysis, designing, and development process of the project
Provided L3 support and fixing production issues
Review peers code and give the appropriate comments to maintain the high performance and code quality
projects.summary: Position aggregator for real time Forex market

projects.name: fco blotter
projects.description:
FCO Blotter is a trade booking and management application for the Forex(FX) and Fixed income(FI) market. FCO Blotter syncs data from a trading platform called Murex for the middle/back office. It uses an FCOMurex application as an interface. The application manages unique types of products called Deals and Structures through the FCS Blotter. A container of multiple trades is called a Deal, and a container with more than one deal is called a Structure. The trade updates are communicated to all the FCO Blotter client instances through a broadcast server using socket communication.

Team size : 3

My contributions
Worked on FCS Blotter enhancements like adding aggregation of Deals and Structures
projects.summary: FCO Blotter is a trading application used to book Forex and Fixed income trades

projects.name: income attribution cube (ia3)
projects.description:
IA3 is an application in the P&L department of Societe Generale CIB that explains Profit and loss of the Equities and Fixed income products of the bank. The purpose of P&L Attribution analysis and reporting is to provide users with a coherent breakdown of the drivers of P&L movements between two points in time with reference to a selected number of easily understandable pricing factors.

Team size : 7

Contributions
Built a UI using SilverLight to manipulate reference data
projects.summary: Modifying generic reference table using SilverLight

projects.name: business activity monitoring
projects.description:
BAM is an extensive and highly complex networked & distributed real-time system used by Societe Generale. BAM monitors FX, FI, FX Options, and FX Orders executed by traders. The system gets data from various sources of trade and consolidates it into reports. The front office/middle office team uses these reports to monitor traders' performances.

My Contributions:
•	Implementation of blotter for products like FX Options and FX Orders
•	Alert generation screen for FI, FX Option, and FX orders
•	Implementation of  OLAP cube for real-time and historically recorded data
•	Developing an interface using Devexpress controls on the BAM client-side to view OLAP Pivot data and its corresponding charting
•	Code quality adhering to standards of SQUALE and SONAR
•	Fixing production issues
•	Application side Jenkins (Continuous Integration tool for .NET projects) support
projects.summary: Application that monitors Forex, Fixed Income and related derivative

projects.name: bam-gps
projects.description:
GPS acts as a server to multiple clients (even BAM). It stores data obtained from various platforms and consolidates to one location. Real-time systems like BAM and MIS (Management Information Systems) get aggregated data from GPS to track market trends. GPS also publishes few SSRS reports. Several downstream platforms use these reports. The GPS also monitors internal market activity and raises alerts. By using highly customizable user alerts, we can keep track of the activities of traders ranging from a minute to few years.

Team size : 8-10

My contributions:
Real-time alerts – Alarm generation tool to enhance monitoring for FI, FX Options and FX Orders market for the real-time data
Historic alerts – Alarm generation tool that uses old non-real-time data to capture milestones on FX, FI, and FX Options market
MIS for FI products was used in the traders' tool to analyze intraday market trends.
Capturing the real-time feeds for FX Orders
Autocomplete feature for searching old historic data(FX, FI, and FX Options)s.
projects.summary: A service used to capture Forex and Fixed Income feeds

work.name: FNF India Pvt. Ltd.
highlights: Helped in migrating Rates services from a Client-Server model to a Cloud-based lift and shift
Implemented a microservice that hits individual atomic instances of a lift-shift Rates service

volunteer.summary: Organized a basic course on Open source technologies with a beginner course on GIMP and OpenSuse operating system
highlights: This was first hands-on session that had more than 20 students participating

awards.summary: Awarded for delivering technical talks like 'Software engineering using Azure DevOps' and non-technical talks like 'Make money before calling yourself an Entrepreneur'

awards.summary: Implementing the automation test cases for a SQL stored procedure that is used to as a backend data for reports

awards.title: Spot Award
awards.summary: This award was given in the very first quarter where I fixed multiple production bugs in my first project.

meta.note: This is a combined version of the old and new JSON Resume API to provide maximum compatibility. You will notice duplicated values in different fields.
